ariaLabel.showPassword: Show password as plain text. Note: this will visually expose your password on the screen.

toast.errorDeleteUsers: Error deleting %{count} user. | Error deleting %{count} users.
toast.errorDisableUsers: Error disabling %{count} user. | Error disabling %{count} users.
toast.errorEnableUsers: Error enabling %{count} user. | Error enabling %{count} users.
toast.successDeleteUsers: Successfully deleted %{count} user. | Successfully deleted %{count} users.
toast.successDisableUsers: Successfully disabled %{count} user. | Successfully disabled %{count} users.
toast.successEnableUsers: Successfully enabled %{count} user. | Successfully enabled %{count} users.

events.noHighEventsMsg: There are no high priority events to display at this time.

pageRebootBmc.rebootInformation: When you reboot the BMC, your web browser loses contact with the BMC for several minutes. When the BMC is back online, you may need to log in again.

modal.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reboot the BMC?

pageServerPowerOperations.immediateReboot: Immediate – Server reboots without OS shutting down; may cause data corruption
pageServerPowerOperations.immediateShutdown: Immediate - Server shuts down without OS shutting down; may cause data corruption
pageServerPowerOperations.operationInProgress: There are no options to display while a power operation is in progress. When complete, power operations will be displayed here.
pageServerPowerOperations.orderlyReboot: Orderly – OS shuts down, then server reboots
pageServerPowerOperations.orderlyShutdown: Orderly - OS shuts down, then server shuts down

modal.confirmRebootMessage: Are you sure you want to reboot?
modal.confirmShutdownMessage: Are you sure you want to shut down?
